FuncDef:
The traffic-segment enable command enables microsegmentation.
The undo traffic-segment enable command disables microsegmentation. The traffic-segment enable command enables microsegmentation. The undo traffic-segment enable command disables microsegmentation. By default, microsegmentation is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ExtraInfo: To enable microsegmentation, run the traffic-segment enable command.
